original_title: Mahabharata: Sabha Parva: The Game of Dice
overview: Covering the critical dice game that leads to the Pandavas losing their kingdom, this animated program continues the tale of the Hindu epic Mahabharata, the story of two families battling for control of the kingdom of Hastinapura. This installment tells the story of how the five Pandava brothers came to marry Draupadi and explains the four goals of life: dharma (duty), artha (wealth), kama (pleasure) and moksha (liberation).
title: Mahabharata: Sabha Parva: The Game of Dice
